text: this is the anointed one, whom the Most High hath kept unto the end The words in brackets are added from the Syriac.  [of days, who shall spring up out of the seed of David, and he shall come and speak] unto them and reprove them for their wickedness and unrighteousness, and shall The Syriac has set in order. See Ps. 1. 21.  heap up before them their contemptuous dealings.
